name: Wyze MJPEG Proxy
short_desc: MJPEG proxy for Wyze cameras and other RTSP streams
author: kamermans
description: A lightweight MJPEG proxy that converts RTSP streams (like Wyze cameras) into MJPEG streams that can be viewed in web browsers or integrated with other applications.

form_fields.name: RTSP_URL
form_fields.label: RTSP Stream URL
form_fields.description: The RTSP stream URL to proxy (e.g., rtsp://root:123456@192.168.1.201:554/ch0_0.h264)

form_fields.name: RESOLUTION
form_fields.label: Resolution
form_fields.description: Output resolution for the MJPEG stream

form_fields.name: QUALITY
form_fields.label: JPEG Quality
form_fields.description: JPEG quality (1-100, higher is better quality)
